Class X509HostnameVerifierAdapter

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.cerner.beadledom.client.resteasy.http.X509HostnameVerifierAdapter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    HostnameVerifier, org.apache.http.conn.ssl.X509HostnameVerifier
    Deprecated. 
    As of 3.6, use Retrofit (https://github.com/square/retrofit) instead.

    @Deprecated
public class X509HostnameVerifierAdapter
extends Object
implements org.apache.http.conn.ssl.X509HostnameVerifier
    An adapter to make a HostnameVerifier compatible with the HttpClient X509HostnameVerifier.
    Since:
    1.0
    Author:
    John Leacox
